subtitle.subtitle: Except for the hue of your skin, but we can fix that.

subtitle.subtitle: The sun has tainted it all brown.

subtitle.subtitle: to think you're a field hand, do you?

subtitle.subtitle: You do look handsome in your boulevard suit.

subtitle.subtitle: Do you think I've applied too much rouge, Richard?
subtitle.translation: Do you think I've applied too much rouge, Richard?

subtitle.subtitle: Now I'm all powder and paint with nothing to do, as usual.

subtitle.subtitle: We could go outside and count stars.
subtitle.translation: We could go outside and count stars.
subtitle.machine_translation: We could go outside and count stars.

subtitle.subtitle: Is that what you do here at night? Count stars?
subtitle.translation: Is that what you do here at night? Count stars?

subtitle.subtitle: Sometimes I play my whistle, and we sing.
subtitle.translation: Sometimes I play my whistle, and we sing.

subtitle.subtitle: Sometimes we mate. Sometimes we sleep.
subtitle.translation: Sometimes we mate. Sometimes we sleep.

subtitle.subtitle: Come on, Richard. Let's show Sylvia how we dance.
subtitle.translation: Come on, Richard. Let's show Sylvia how we dance.
subtitle.machine_translation: Come on, Richard. Let's show Sylvia how we dance.

subtitle.subtitle: Come on, Sylvia. You try it.

subtitle.machine_translation: Come on, Sylvia. You try it.

subtitle.subtitle: I don't call that a dance. It's childish and simple-minded.
subtitle.translation: I don't call that a dance. It's childish and simple-minded.
subtitle.machine_translation: I don't call that a dance. It's childish and simple-minded.

subtitle.subtitle: Grown people don't dance like that.
subtitle.translation: Grown people don't dance like that.
subtitle.machine_translation: Grown people don't dance like that.

subtitle.subtitle: Maybe we should learn a grown-up dance for San Francisco?
subtitle.translation: Maybe we should learn a grown-up dance for San Francisco?

subtitle.subtitle: It's a bit naughty. It's called the Spanish polka.

subtitle.subtitle: Kiss me, darling, on the cheek
subtitle.translation: Kiss me, darling, on the cheek
subtitle.machine_translation: Kiss me, darling, on the cheek

subtitle.subtitle: One, two, three. One, two, three. One, two, three.

subtitle.subtitle: Lillian's going to have to brush up on her manners.
subtitle.translation: Lillian's going to have to brush up on her manners.

subtitle.subtitle: It's not polite to leave your guest in the middle of a lesson.
subtitle.translation: It's not polite to leave your guest in the middle of a lesson.
subtitle.machine_translation: It's not polite to leave your guest in the middle of a lesson.

subtitle.subtitle: Sorry, but she'll just have to wait her turn.
subtitle.translation: Sorry, but she'll just have to wait her turn.
subtitle.machine_translation: Sorry, but she'll just have to wait her turn.

subtitle.subtitle: One, two, three. One, two, three.
subtitle.translation: One, two, three. One, two, three.
subtitle.machine_translation: One, two, three. One, two, three.

subtitle.subtitle: She's gonna teach me how to mazurka.
subtitle.translation: She's gonna teach me how to mazurka.
subtitle.machine_translation: She's gonna teach me how to mazurka.

subtitle.subtitle: As soon as I get it right, I'll show you.
subtitle.translation: As soon as I get it right, I'll show you.
subtitle.machine_translation: As soon as I get it right, I'll show you.

subtitle.subtitle: When did I lie to you?
subtitle.translation: When did I lie to you?
subtitle.machine_translation: When did I lie to you?

subtitle.subtitle: You told me once that you'd never hurt me.
subtitle.translation: You told me once that you'd never hurt me.
subtitle.machine_translation: You told me once that you'd never hurt me.

subtitle.subtitle: When you always stare at her, it hurts me.
subtitle.translation: When you always stare at her, it hurts me.
subtitle.machine_translation: When you always stare at her, it hurts me.

subtitle.subtitle: It's just that she's so different.
subtitle.translation: It's just that she's so different.
subtitle.machine_translation: It's just that she's so different.

subtitle.subtitle: The way she's all covered up.
subtitle.translation: The way she's all covered up.
subtitle.machine_translation: The way she's all covered up.

subtitle.subtitle: But you said you found all those clothes stupid and unnecessary.
subtitle.translation: But you said you found all those clothes stupid and unnecessary.
subtitle.machine_translation: But you said you found all those clothes stupid and unnecessary.

subtitle.subtitle: It's just... I wonder what she looks like underneath all of them.
subtitle.translation: It's just... I wonder what she looks like underneath all of them.
subtitle.machine_translation: It's just... I wonder what she looks like underneath all of them.

subtitle.subtitle: You mean, you want to look at her, because you can't see her?
subtitle.translation: You mean, you want to look at her, because you can't see her?
subtitle.machine_translation: You mean, you want to look at her, because you can't see her?

subtitle.subtitle: You remember when I wanted to go to the north side of the island
subtitle.translation: You remember when I wanted to go to the north side of the island
subtitle.machine_translation: You remember when I wanted to go to the north side of the island

subtitle.subtitle: And I also remember what almost happened to you when you did go.
subtitle.translation: And I also remember what almost happened to you when you did go.
subtitle.machine_translation: And I also remember what almost happened to you when you did go.

subtitle.subtitle: -What have you done to yourself? -Don't you like it?
subtitle.translation: -What have you done to yourself? -Don't you like it?
subtitle.machine_translation: -What have you done to yourself? -Don't you like it?

subtitle.subtitle: You don't like it on me, but you love it on Sylvia.
subtitle.translation: You don't like it on me, but you love it on Sylvia.
subtitle.machine_translation: You don't like it on me, but you love it on Sylvia.

subtitle.subtitle: You never eat breakfast anymore. Are you sick?
subtitle.translation: You never eat breakfast anymore. Are you sick?
subtitle.machine_translation: You never eat breakfast anymore. Are you sick?

subtitle.subtitle: Richard, I'm ready for my lesson now.
subtitle.translation: Richard, I'm ready for my lesson now.
subtitle.machine_translation: Richard, I'm ready for my lesson now.

subtitle.subtitle: I promised to teach her how to fish.
subtitle.translation: I promised to teach her how to fish.
subtitle.machine_translation: I promised to teach her how to fish.

subtitle.subtitle: Out here in the middle of a beautiful fishpond.
subtitle.translation: Out here in the middle of a beautiful fishpond.
subtitle.machine_translation: Out here in the middle of a beautiful fishpond.

subtitle.subtitle: But look at this, kind sir.
subtitle.translation: But look at this, kind sir.
subtitle.machine_translation: But look at this, kind sir.

subtitle.subtitle: All we have to do is lower our heads...
subtitle.translation: All we have to do is lower our heads...
subtitle.machine_translation: All we have to do is lower our heads...

subtitle.subtitle: And we're completely hidden from prying eyes.
subtitle.translation: And we're completely hidden from prying eyes.
subtitle.machine_translation: And we're completely hidden from prying eyes.

subtitle.subtitle: So we can do whatever we want.
subtitle.translation: So we can do whatever we want.
subtitle.machine_translation: So we can do whatever we want.

subtitle.subtitle: Come on, don't be like that.
subtitle.translation: Come on, don't be like that.
subtitle.machine_translation: Come on, don't be like that.

subtitle.subtitle: He'll never hear you. He'll be out playing games with Miss Sylvia for hours.
subtitle.translation: He'll never hear you. He'll be out playing games with Miss Sylvia for hours.
subtitle.machine_translation: He'll never hear you. He'll be out playing games with Miss Sylvia for hours.

subtitle.subtitle: -Where's your lovely pearl? -I don't know what you mean.
subtitle.translation: -Where's your lovely pearl? -I don't know what you mean.
subtitle.machine_translation: -Where's your lovely pearl? -I don't know what you mean.

subtitle.subtitle: The white bead that you wear in your hair. Where is it?
subtitle.translation: The white bead that you wear in your hair. Where is it?
subtitle.machine_translation: The white bead that you wear in your hair. Where is it?

subtitle.subtitle: It's no time to be thinking about Lilli.
subtitle.translation: It's no time to be thinking about Lilli.
subtitle.machine_translation: It's no time to be thinking about Lilli.

subtitle.subtitle: I told her I'd never hurt her.
subtitle.translation: I told her I'd never hurt her.
subtitle.machine_translation: I told her I'd never hurt her.

subtitle.subtitle: Don't feel sorry for her, Richard. She's had you all to herself.
subtitle.translation: Don't feel sorry for her, Richard. She's had you all to herself.
subtitle.machine_translation: Don't feel sorry for her, Richard. She's had you all to herself.

subtitle.subtitle: But she doesn't own you. You're not married.
subtitle.translation: But she doesn't own you. You're not married.
subtitle.machine_translation: But she doesn't own you. You're not married.

subtitle.subtitle: A lot of made up words in the middle of a jungle doesn't count.
subtitle.translation: A lot of made up words in the middle of a jungle doesn't count.
subtitle.machine_translation: A lot of made up words in the middle of a jungle doesn't count.

subtitle.subtitle: Why don't you just follow your heart.
subtitle.translation: Why don't you just follow your heart.
subtitle.machine_translation: Why don't you just follow your heart.

subtitle.subtitle: You can't just leave me here.
subtitle.translation: You can't just leave me here.
subtitle.machine_translation: You can't just leave me here.

subtitle.subtitle: You'll never fit in civilized society.
subtitle.translation: You'll never fit in civilized society.
subtitle.machine_translation: You'll never fit in civilized society.

subtitle.subtitle: -That came from the house. -Get the other rifle, quickly.
subtitle.translation: -That came from the house. -Get the other rifle, quickly.
subtitle.machine_translation: -That came from the house. -Get the other rifle, quickly.

subtitle.subtitle: You heard me, I said enough.
subtitle.translation: You heard me, I said enough.
subtitle.machine_translation: You heard me, I said enough.

subtitle.subtitle: Keep out of it, Giddens. I'll take his bloody head off.
subtitle.translation: Keep out of it, Giddens. I'll take his bloody head off.
subtitle.machine_translation: Keep out of it, Giddens. I'll take his bloody head off.

subtitle.subtitle: You heard the Captain. Drop that, or you'll answer to mutiny.
subtitle.translation: You heard the Captain. Drop that, or you'll answer to mutiny.
subtitle.machine_translation: You heard the Captain. Drop that, or you'll answer to mutiny.

subtitle.subtitle: I always weather a storm well.
subtitle.translation: I always weather a storm well.
subtitle.machine_translation: I always weather a storm well.

subtitle.subtitle: -I get that from Mother. -Yes, you do.
subtitle.translation: -I get that from Mother. -Yes, you do.
subtitle.machine_translation: -I get that from Mother. -Yes, you do.

subtitle.machine_translation: Capt. Hilliard says he wants to set sail at dawn.

subtitle.machine_translation: I guess that means Capt. Hilliard's daughter wants to set sail at dawn.

subtitle.subtitle: I don't care what she wants.
subtitle.translation: I don't care what she wants.
subtitle.machine_translation: I don't care what she wants.

subtitle.subtitle: I don't care about her at all. I know that now, Lilli.
subtitle.translation: I don't care about her at all. I know that now, Lilli.
subtitle.machine_translation: I don't care about her at all. I know that now, Lilli.

subtitle.subtitle: Don't you understand, you're the most important thing to me.
subtitle.translation: Don't you understand, you're the most important thing to me.
subtitle.machine_translation: Don't you understand, you're the most important thing to me.

subtitle.subtitle: You can set sail at dawn.
subtitle.translation: You can set sail at dawn.

subtitle.subtitle: That lullaby she used to sing to us?
subtitle.translation: That lullaby she used to sing to us?
subtitle.machine_translation: That lullaby she used to sing to us?

subtitle.subtitle: Will you teach me to play it on this?
subtitle.translation: Will you teach me to play it on this?
subtitle.machine_translation: Will you teach me to play it on this?

subtitle.subtitle: I'm going to have use for it.
subtitle.translation: I'm going to have use for it.
subtitle.machine_translation: I'm going to have use for it.

subtitle.subtitle: There's a baby growing inside of me.
subtitle.translation: There's a baby growing inside of me.
subtitle.machine_translation: There's a baby growing inside of me.

subtitle.subtitle: A woman knows these kind of things, that's how.
subtitle.translation: A woman knows these kind of things, that's how.
subtitle.machine_translation: A woman knows these kind of things, that's how.

subtitle.subtitle: And I won't let it be born in civilization.
subtitle.translation: And I won't let it be born in civilization.
subtitle.machine_translation: And I won't let it be born in civilization.

subtitle.subtitle: I want it to be born right here.
subtitle.translation: I want it to be born right here.
subtitle.machine_translation: I want it to be born right here.

subtitle.subtitle: Where there's no evil, and no lies, and no guns.
